summary:
This MOD adds several recipes which craft alchemic ingredient
by using some kind of miscitems, foods or (other kind of)ingredient.
descriptionHtml:
v0.5Oil: You can craft 1 lantern oil from 5 animal fat in cooking pot.
Required "Wearble Lantern(by Chesko)"

v0.5Fix: "Dragon Blood Elixer" recipe


This MOD adds several recipes which craft alchemic ingredient
by using some kind of miscitems, foods or (other kind of)ingredient.


FEATURES:

This MOD adds these recipes.
( * means hidden recipe if you don't have some required item.)



=======Craft by CookingPot=======

<<AnimalFat>>(New Ingredient! This is useful for fighters.)
1 GoatMeat = 1 (*)
1 Pheasant = 1 (*)
2 Venison = 1 (*)
1 Beef = 1 (*)
1 HorkerMeat = 2
1 MammothMeat = 2 (*)

<<Dragon Vestige>>(New Ingredient! This is useful for healers.)
1 DragonBone = 3 (*)
1 DragonScales = 2 (*)

<<Mountain Flower Blue>>
1 MagicalInkwell & 30 Mountain Flower Red/Purple = 30 (*)

<<Mountain Flower Red>>
1 MagicalInkwell & 30 Mountain Flower Blue/Purple = 30 (*)

<<Mountain Flower Purple>>
1 MagicalInkwell & 30 Mountain Flower Red/Blue = 30 (*)

<<InkWell>>
1 Charcoal & 1 Snowberry = 1

<<Magical InkWell>>(New MiscItem! Now you can repaint "Mountain Flowers".)
1 InkWell, 1 Nirnroot & 3 GlowDust = 1

<<Potion Of DragonBlood>>(New Potion! This is very good Healing Potion.)
5 Dragon Vestige, 1 HoneyComb & 1 SpicedWine = 1(Required Perk "Physician")

<<Elixir Of DragonBlood>>(New Potion! This is very good Healing Potion.)
1 Potion Of DragonBlood & 1 CyrodilicBrandy = 1(Required Perk "Physician")

<<SprigganSap>>
1 Taproot = 1 (*)


=======Craft by Smelter=======

<<BoneMeal>>
1 HumanSkull = 2
1 HorkerTusk = 2 (*)
1 TrollSkull = 4 (*)

<<Charred SkeeverHide>>
1 SkeeverTail, 1 SaltPile & 1 Charcoal = 1 (*)

<<Dragon Vestige>>(New Ingredient!)
1 DragonBone = 3 (*)
1 DragonScales = 2 (*)

<<Dwarven Oil>>
20 GlowingMushroom = 1(Required Perk "Dwarven Smithing") (*)
3 Taproot = 1(Required Perk "Dwarven Smithing") (*)

<<Ectoplasm>>
1 SoulGem(Lesser Filled) = 1
1 SoulGem(Common Filled) = 2 (*)
1 SoulGem(Greater Filled) = 3 (*)
1 SoulGem(Grand Filled) = 5 (*)

<<FireSalt>>
1 DragonVestage & 1 Garnet = 1
1 DragonVestage & 1 Garnet(Flawless) = 2 (*)
1 DragonVestage & 1 Ruby = 2 (*)
1 DragonVestage & 1 Ruby(Flawless) = 3 (*)

<<FrostSalt>>
1 DragonVestage & 1 Sapphire = 1
1 DragonVestage & 1 Sapphire(Flawless) = 2 (*)
1 DragonVestage & 1 Diamond = 2 (*)
1 DragonVestage & 1 Diamond(Flawless) = 3 (*)

<<VoidSalt>>
1 DragonVestage & 1 Amethyst = 1
1 DragonVestage & 1 Amethyst(Flawless) = 2 (*)
1 DragonVestage & 1 Emerald = 2 (*)
1 DragonVestage & 1 Emerald(Flawless) = 3 (*)

<<GlowDust>>
1 Garnet = 1
1 Amethyst = 1 (*)
1 Ruby = 2 (*)
1 Sapphire = 2 (*)
1 Garnet(Flawless) = 2
1 Amethyst(Flawless) = 2 (*)
1 Emerald = 3 (*)
1 Diamond =3 (*)
1 Ruby(Flawless) = 3 (*)
1 Sapphire(Flawless) = 3 (*)
1 Emerald(Flawless) = 4 (*)
1 Diamond(Flawless) = 5

<<PoweredMammothTusk>>
1 MammothTusk = 4 (*)

<<SaltPile>>
3 SpikyGrass = 1 SaltPile (*)

<<InsectDust>>(New Ingredient! This is useful for poisoners.)
2 FrostbiteVenom = 1 (*)
1 ChaurasChitin = 1 (*)


=======Craft by SmithingForge=======

<<SoulGem(Petty Filled)>>
1 SoulGem(Petty) & 2 DragonVestige(Required Perk "Enchant Rank1")

<<SoulGem(Lesser Filled)>>
1 SoulGem(Lesser) & 3 DragonVestige(Required Perk "Enchant Rank2")

<<SoulGem(Common Filled)>>
1 SoulGem(Common) & 4 DragonVestige(Required Perk "Enchant Rank3")

<<SoulGem(Greater Filled)>>
1 SoulGem(Greater) & 5 DragonVestige(Required Perk "Enchant Rank4")

<<SoulGem(Grand Filled)>>
1 SoulGem(Grand) & 9 DragonVestige(Required Perk "Enchant Rank5")

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dragon has very strong life power.
I think that the Dovahkiin cannot completely absorb it.
Now you can use the power of vestage.
author: SasameSnow
